Package org.cpnsim.network

Class DcBwManager

java.lang.Object
org.cpnsim.network.DcBwManager
public class DcBwManager extends Object
DcBwManager manages the bandwidth between the data centers. It is initialized through a csv file such as "./resources/dcBw.csv". If needed, the instance group in the affinity group request can lease bandwidth between data centers. When the instance group is received by the data center, the bandwidth between data centers is occupied. When the instance group ends running, the bandwidth between data centers is released. It also calculates the total cost of rented bandwidth for all user requests.
Since:
LGDCloudSim 1.0
Author:
Jiawen Liu

    • allocateBw

      public boolean allocateBw(int srcDcId, int dstDcId, double allocateBw)
      Allocate the bandwidth between the source data center and the destination data center. The cost is only related to the amount of bandwidth occupied and the unit price of the broadband, not to the rental time. TODO: Consider the rental time when calculating broadband rental prices.
      Parameters:
      srcDcId - the source data center id.
      dstDcId - the destination data center id.
      allocateBw - the bandwidth to allocate.
      Returns:
      whether the bandwidth is allocated successfully.

    • releaseBw

      public void releaseBw(int srcDcId, int dstDcId, double releaseBw)
      Release the bandwidth between the source data center and the destination data center.
      Parameters:
      srcDcId - the source data center id.
      dstDcId - the destination data center id.
      releaseBw - the bandwidth to release.
